sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"例子，事例"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: example, instance, case, sample, illustration, specimen
means: example ： 普通用词，指能代表同类事物性质或一般规律的典型例子。
instance ： 多指用于说明、支持或反证一般事实或理论的事例。
case ： 多指需要加以认真研究的实例，如病例，案例等。
illustration ： 指用来说明、解释某种理论或看法而引用的例证。
specimen可与sample换用，但常指人或物中选出的有代表性部分，或指供科研、化验或检验用的标本。

word_mean: 样品：一件或几件物体的一部份或样品，用以表示或明确其整体的特征
标本：用以进行病理检查的组织制品，或者用以研究其结构的正常组织、器官或生物的制品

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'pattern, model'): from Latin, from specere 'to look'

encyclopedia.content: specimen n. 范例， 标本, 样品， 样本， 待试验物 specimen spec.i.men n.Abbr. sp.（名词）缩写 sp. An individual, an item, or a part representative of a class, genus, or whole.See Synonyms at example 样本：单个或一条细目，代表一类、一种或一整体的个体参见 example A sample, as of tissue, blood, or urine, used for analysis and diagnosis. 抽样：用来作分析和诊断的组织、血液或尿液的抽样 Informal An individ

entry.def: A specimen is a single plant or animal which is an example of a particular species or type and is examined by scientists.

example.ex: 200,000 specimens of fungus are kept at the Komarov Botanical Institute.
example.tran: 有 20 万份菌类标本被保存在科马罗夫植物研究所。

entry.def: A specimen of something is an example of it which gives an idea of what the whole of it is like.

example.ex: Job applicants have to submit a specimen of handwriting.
example.tran: 求职者必须要提交一份笔迹样本。

entry.tran: (供检验用的尿、血液等体液的)抽样，样本
entry.def: A specimen is a small quantity of someone's urine, blood, or other body fluid which is examined in a medical laboratory, in order to find out if they are ill or if they have been drinking alcohol or taking drugs.

example.ex: He refused to provide a specimen...
If your urine specimen shows the presence of bacteria, you'll be prescribed antibiotics.
example.tran: 如果你的尿样显示有细菌存在，医生会给你开抗生素。

entry.def: You can use specimen to refer to someone who has a quality of a particular kind.

example.ex: What a poor specimen that child is!...
He is a fine specimen of his class.
example.tran: 他是他那类人的典型代表。

means.word_mean: 1. an example regarded as typical of its class
2. a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken for diagnostic purposes;

sentences.sentence: "they collected a urine specimen for urinalysis"

auth_sentence.content: Landis might have benefited by such dual specimen collection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Landis might have benefited by such dual specimen collection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Landis might have benefited by such dual specimen collection.

auth_sentence.content: The unique specimen was found in the Dominican Republic.
auth_sentence.res_content: The unique specimen was found in the Dominican Republic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The unique specimen was found in the Dominican Republic.

auth_sentence.content: Buck's wives seemed another sort of specimen collection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Buck's wives seemed another sort of specimen collection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Buck's wives seemed another sort of specimen collection.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+specific特有的→共同特有的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+al……的→adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+fic→具体的,特有的
e+special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]→adj.特别的, 特殊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 似是而非的,华而不实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ous……的→外观相似而实质不同
especial[adj.特别的, 特殊的]+ly表副词→adv.特别, 尤其
special特殊的,专门的+ist专家或人→n.专门医师, 专家
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ity表名词→n.[specialty]特性,性质;专业/长;特产
speci外观,种类,特别+es表复数→[所有]种类
specific[adj.明确的,具体的;特定的,特有的]+ation表名词→n.详述;[常n.]规格,说明书,规范
speci外观,种类,特别+men表物品→n.标本,样本
special[adj.特殊的,专门的;附加的,额外的]+ize化→v.[specialise][in]专攻,专门研究,专业化

stems_affixes.value_cn: 指定, 详细说明, 列入清单
stems_affixes.word_buile: speci外观,种类,特别+ify表动词→specify规类→指定, 列入清单

means.word_mean: 范例, 典范, 实例

sentences.en: It was a specimen of his generosity.
sentences.cn: 这是他慷慨大方的一个实例。

sentences.en: The traveler brought back some specimens of the rocks from the mountains.
sentences.cn: 那位旅行者从山上带回了一些岩石标本。

means.word_mean: 某种类型的人, 家伙, 怪人

sentences.en: He is an odd specimen in our school.
sentences.cn: 他在我们学校是一个古怪的人。

jushi.english: He is an odd specimen in our school.
jushi.chinese: 他在我们学校是一个古怪的人。

jushi.english: The traveler brought back some specimens of the rocks from the mountains.
jushi.chinese: 那位旅行者从山上带回了一些岩石标本。

jushi.english: It was a specimen of his generosity.
jushi.chinese: 这是他慷慨大方的一个实例。
